DefaultEvent.Description: The next morning, she gives you a pewter locket. As you reach for it, she grips it briefly in her fist. "Don't you dare forget me," she says.
DefaultEvent.Name: An interlude

ChildBranches.Name: A Likely Lass
ChildBranches.Description: She tipsily claims to be a spy. Whatever she is, she's easy to like, and when the evening ends you're still together...

DefaultEvent.Description: The next morning, he gives you a golden locket. "Don't lose it," he says with a grin. Then he grows suddenly grave. "Truly. Don't lose it."
DefaultEvent.Name: An interlude

ChildBranches.Name: A Dapper Chap
ChildBranches.Description: An elegant fellow with a Presbyterate accent and an unexpectedly delighted laugh. By the evening's end, it seems natural that he should accompany you home.

DefaultEvent.Description: Together, you exorcise the chill of the Neath. When you wake, you're alone, but that's how you've always preferred it.
DefaultEvent.Name: A relaxing evening

ChildBranches.Name: Someone whose name you do not afterwards recall
ChildBranches.Description: Your only love is the zee. You'll take comfort where you find it, but that's all it is.

DefaultEvent.Description: Shared warmth, new memories. It's harder to say goodbye, this time.
DefaultEvent.Name: A few hours together

RareDefaultEvent.Description: Shared warmth, new memories. It's harder to say goodbye, this time.
RareDefaultEvent.Name: A few hours together

ChildBranches.Name: ..the Likely Lass
ChildBranches.Description: "Don't think I came down to the docks just to see you. I've got business here. But, all right, it did cross my mind that you might drop by..."

DefaultEvent.Description: Shared warmth, new memories. It's harder to say goodbye, this time.
DefaultEvent.Name: A few hours together

RareDefaultEvent.Description: Shared warmth, new memories. It's harder to say goodbye, this time.
RareDefaultEvent.Name: Something more

ChildBranches.Name: ...the Dapper Chap
ChildBranches.Description: "It's not such a coincidence," he protests. "I had to meet a ship from home. Another one." His eyes meet yours. "But it's good to see you."

Description: That night in Wolfstack, you find yourself sharing a table with....
Name: Trouble, and romance
